remarks: If two structures have the same ` Hom ` slot, they have the same Hom-sets.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement:
homfeqd.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( Base ` C ) = ( Base ` D ) ) $.
homfeqd.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( Hom ` C ) = ( Hom ` D ) ) $.
homfeqd $p |- ( ph -> ( Homf ` C ) = ( Homf ` D ) ) $.
